experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
Created architecture to analyse and process incoming signaling attacks on mobile networks using the Java-based programming language Clojure
Developed with a team an interactive UI for analysing the landscape of signaling intelligence using ClojureScript and React.js
Connected this UI to an ElasticSearch database, with the data processed into tables and plots
Assisted in the launch of development builds to production-ready servers through Docker and remote-access through SSH

Methods of visualising data

Software Security
Exploration of emerging technologies (VR/AR, Blockchain)

portfolio.title: What's for Dinner
portfolio.description:
A meal recommendation application for Android.
This application takes in calorie information from food you have eaten throughout the day, and recommends a dinner that can closest reach all nutritional targets (i.e. calories, fat, fibre, carbohydrates, and protein.)
Utilised the Edamam food database.

Created for my undergraduate dissertation.

portfolio.title: Today I
portfolio.description:
A lightweight accomplishment and day rating tracker app for Android.
Features include: daily notifications, backup/import functionality, and customisable rating scales.

Created as a personal project in 2020, with 2.0 released in 2022.

portfolio.title: BirdScape
portfolio.description:
A virtual reality demonstration of bird declines created with game development engine Unity.
This demonstration utilises data from Avonet regarding threats to birds, conservation efforts, and morphological data. The aim of the work was to raise public awareness of the major threats affecting birds, backed up by data, visualised in an engaging way.

Created for my masters dissertation.
